name: Relais Blu Belvedere

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.text: Me and my daughter stayed her for 3 nights in September. We had a lovely room with fabulous bathroom. Lovely view from our room. The main terrace is amazing with views of Capri to die for. The infinity pool is lovely with a wonderfully glorious view over the gulf. We dined in the restaurant, this was a very enjoyable experience if not somewhat expensive, however you do get freebies throughout. I have a couple of suggestions that would make this a perfect place.
I would like to have a lighter hairdryer in the bathroom with a button that you dont have to keep your finger on to keep it on , hairdryer so heavy and difficult to use.
reviews.title: Ridiculous views, bathrooms, and service! Food also very good. Location lends to needing a vehicle but we enjoyed driving. T
